stimulusHtml: Roman innovations in concrete allowed the builders of the Colosseum to

features.html: The images show two views of the Colosseum (Flavian Amphitheater).

choicesHtml: include a massive velarium, or sunshade, that could be extended or retracted over the spectators
create a multileveled freestanding structure with tiered seating that could be constructed quickly
construct a watertight rim around the pit for the purpose of flooding the arena for sea battles
organize seating according to the differing social status of the spectators
